EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-01-17-infrastructure initiatives survey.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: $50 Amazon Gift Card | 2018 Infrastructure Initiatives Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/WVMPPSK?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_zo8jzhpyio=[marketo_zo8jzhpyio_value]&marketo_njw04rm35s=[marketo_njw04rm35s_value]&marketo_4gg309aesw=[marketo_4gg309aesw_value]&marketo_bh0yhxwawg=[marketo_bh0yhxwawg_value]&marketo_4vhbuywldc=[marketo_4vhbuywldc_value]&marketo_u9rwgayzxc=[marketo_u9rwgayzxc_value]&marketo_i88efuws4w=[marketo_i88efuws4w_value]&marketo_2uy3j5gljk=[marketo_2uy3j5gljk_value]]]> {{lead.First Name:default=Hi there}}, At Turbonomic our mission is to be far more than just a vendor. This is why we want to take a step back, let you know that we understand your time is extremely valuable and extend an offer to partner with you to understand your 2018 Infrastructure Initiatives. We are excited to roll out our brand new 2018 Infrastructure Initiatives Survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/WVMPPSK?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_zo8jzhpyio=[marketo_zo8jzhpyio_value]&marketo_njw04rm35s=[marketo_njw04rm35s_value]&marketo_4gg309aesw=[marketo_4gg309aesw_value]&marketo_bh0yhxwawg=[marketo_bh0yhxwawg_value]&marketo_4vhbuywldc=[marketo_4vhbuywldc_value]&marketo_u9rwgayzxc=[marketo_u9rwgayzxc_value]&marketo_i88efuws4w=[marketo_i88efuws4w_value]&marketo_2uy3j5gljk=[marketo_2uy3j5gljk_value]]]>. We are offering 10 chances to win a $50 Amazon gift card for completing the 3 minute survey by end of day today (January 16th). Furthermore, we are offering an additional $50 Amazon gift card for agreeing to a 30 minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer (meeting must complete by January 31st). If at the end of the meeting, you choose to engage in a proof of value, we will donate $1,000 to the 501(c)(3) charity of your choosing to make the world a better place. We look forward to the opportunity to speak with you around how Turbonomic is changing the IT industry for the better, but we are much more excited to partner with you to make an impact for a cause that is close to you. <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/WVMPPSK?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_zo8jzhpyio=[marketo_zo8jzhpyio_value]&marketo_njw04rm35s=[marketo_njw04rm35s_value]&marketo_4gg309aesw=[marketo_4gg309aesw_value]&marketo_bh0yhxwawg=[marketo_bh0yhxwawg_value]&marketo_4vhbuywldc=[marketo_4vhbuywldc_value]&marketo_u9rwgayzxc=[marketo_u9rwgayzxc_value]&marketo_i88efuws4w=[marketo_i88efuws4w_value]&marketo_2uy3j5gljk=[marketo_2uy3j5gljk_value]]]> - The Turbonomic Team <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/WVMPPSK?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_zo8jzhpyio=[marketo_zo8jzhpyio_value]&marketo_njw04rm35s=[marketo_njw04rm35s_value]&marketo_4gg309aesw=[marketo_4gg309aesw_value]&marketo_bh0yhxwawg=[marketo_bh0yhxwawg_value]&marketo_4vhbuywldc=[marketo_4vhbuywldc_value]&marketo_u9rwgayzxc=[marketo_u9rwgayzxc_value]&marketo_i88efuws4w=[marketo_i88efuws4w_value]&marketo_2uy3j5gljk=[marketo_2uy3j5gljk_value]]]>
